TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Tkijig, title = Tkijig, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tkijig} }

S.FORM: == Tkijig == u sulit nu Hulam 得吉利部落 u siwkay nu niyazu' i Hualien a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Tkijig. u kasalumaluma' nu Tkijig sa, 219 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 684 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 410 ku tademaw, pakalatu 60%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 274 ku tademaw, pakalatu 40%. u asip nu cidekay a tademaw u kasabinacadan, Taluku(Truku) 50%, Pangcah(Amis) 4%, Tayan(Tayal) 3%, Yuwatan(Bunun) 1%, Saysia(SaySiyat) 1%, zumazuma 2%. u niyazu' nu Taluku(Truku) u niyazu' nu Taluku(Truku) kuyni, katuud ku Taluku(Truku) itini mueneng. u zuma a tademaw sa u Yuwatan(Bunun), u Tayan atu Pangcah. inayi' tu ku zuma cidekay a tademaw itini mueneng. u Sakizaya a tademaw inay' ku Sakizaya a tademaw mueneng itini, hakay izaw tu, caay henay misumad ku cidekay a ngangan nu Sakizaya. u cidekay nu Taywan Yincumin u siwkay nu Yincumin u niyazu' sa, u luyaluy nu tademaw, pulung muengeneng, u kabana' kami, hina u lalumaay amin i niyazu', caay kayadah ku ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamu, atu kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tumuk) saca babalaki mililid tu niyazu'. i Taywan Yincumin, izaw ku 16 cidekay puluung sa 748 a niyazu', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ku Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ku Laaluwa. u tabakiaya a niyazu' sa, ku Tapalong, u niyazu' nu Pangcah(Amis). tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2017 a mihcan 11 a bulad tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 3 a bulad pulung sausi (560,820), Pangcah (209,203), Tayan (89,958), Paywan (100,591), Yuwatan (58,336), Rukay (13,303), Puyuma (14,118), Cou (6,635), Saysiat (6,601), Yami (4,599), Saw (780), Kabalan (1,466), Taluku (31,446), Sakizaya (930), Sejek (9,975), Laaluwa (398), Kanakanabu (330), zuma (12,320) tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 4 a bulad pulung sausi (561,327), Pangcah (209,430), Tayan (90,059), Paywan (100,689), Yuwatan (58,390), Rukay (13,314), Puyuma (14,140), Cou (6,635), Saysiat (6,607), Yami (4,606), Saw (785), Kabalan (1,465), Taluku (31,501), Sakizaya (929), Sejek (9,992), Laaluwa (399), Kanakanabu (334), zuma (12,052)

== Tkijig == o solit no Holam 得吉利部落 o siwkay no niyazo' i Hoalien a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Tkijig. o kasalomaloma' no Tkijig sa, 219 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 684 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 410 ko tademaw, pakalato 60%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 274 ko tademaw, pakalato 40%. o asip no cidekay a tademaw o kasabinacadan, Taloko(Troko) 50%, Pangcah(Amis) 4%, Tayan(Tayal) 3%, Yowatan(Bonon) 1%, Saysia(SaySiyat) 1%, zomazoma 2%. o niyazo' no Taloko(Troko) o niyazo' no Taloko(Troko) koyni, katood ko Taloko(Troko) itini moeneng. o zoma a tademaw sa o Yowatan(Bonon), o Tayan ato Pangcah. inayi' to ko zoma cidekay a tademaw itini moeneng. o Sakizaya a tademaw inay' ko Sakizaya a tademaw moeneng itini, hakay izaw to, caay henay misomad ko cidekay a ngangan no Sakizaya. o cidekay no Taywan Yincomin o siwkay no Yincomin o niyazo' sa, o loyaloy no tademaw, polong moengeneng, o kabana' kami, hina o lalomaay amin i niyazo', caay kayadah ko ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamo, ato kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tomok) saca babalaki mililid to niyazo'. i Taywan Yincomin, izaw ko 16 cidekay poloong sa 748 a niyazo', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ko Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ko Laalowa. o tabakiaya a niyazo' sa, ko Tapalong, o niyazo' no Pangcah(Amis). tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2017 a mihcan 11 a bolad tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 3 a bolad polong saosi (560,820), Pangcah (209,203), Tayan (89,958), Paywan (100,591), Yowatan (58,336), Rokay (13,303), Poyoma (14,118), Coo (6,635), Saysiat (6,601), Yami (4,599), Saw (780), Kabalan (1,466), Taloko (31,446), Sakizaya (930), Sejek (9,975), Laalowa (398), Kanakanabo (330), zoma (12,320) tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 4 a bolad polong saosi (561,327), Pangcah (209,430), Tayan (90,059), Paywan (100,689), Yowatan (58,390), Rokay (13,314), Poyoma (14,140), Coo (6,635), Saysiat (6,607), Yami (4,606), Saw (785), Kabalan (1,465), Taloko (31,501), Sakizaya (929), Sejek (9,992), Laalowa (399), Kanakanabo (334), zoma (12,052)
